title: Pbe downloading at 200kb/s? 10 hours?
body: Just wondering if this is normal, as I usually get like 30mb/s on things like steam and normal client, does it have to do with the bunch of new PBE players or is it just an unlucky day for me?

replies.body: I haven't seen any issues with downloading PBE from the patching servers.  If this is still an issue for you, try our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in case your network is running into any sangs along the way.
